level.heading: Regulations.
level.text: The Commissioner may promulgate rules and regulations necessary or appropriate to implement the provisions of this chapter.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: D.C. Law 17-155 substituted "necessary or appropriate" for "necessary".

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 14-264
level.text: For Law 14-264, see notes following ยง 31-1131.01.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 17-155
level.text: For Law 17-155, see notes following ยง 31-1131.02.
